es.ull.iis.simulation.factory
Class StandardCompilator

java.lang.Object
  es.ull.iis.simulation.factory.StandardCompilator

public class StandardCompilator
extends java.lang.Object

Class defined to simulate a standar Java compilator. Thas class can invoke the Java compiler and store the bytecode for futures instances.

Author:
ycallero

Process the code looking for access variable's tags. If a tag is found it's changed to the java code traduction.

getInstance

public static java.lang.Object getInstance(java.lang.String workingPkg,
                                           java.lang.String objectType,
                                           int id,
                                           java.lang.String constructorStr,
                                           SimulationUserCode userMethods,
                                           java.lang.Object... initargs)
Returns an instance of a simulation object. There are several important remarks:
  1. The class code is generated
  2. The class code is packed into an special structure
  3. The class is compiled and the constructors returned
  4. Each constructor is tried until a suitable one is found
The reason not to directly look for a specific constructor is that the Class.getConstructor method only returns a constructor when the match is PERFECT, that is, no subclasses are allowed.

Parameters:
workingPkg - The working package of the instanced class
objectType - The simple name of the class
id - A unique identifier for this instance among the other class instances
constructorStr - How the constructor is defined, starting with the parameters, e.g. "(Simulation simul){super(simul);}"
userMethods - User code and imports to be included in the new instance
initargs - Arguments passed to the constructor when creating the instance
Returns:
An instance of a simulation object

param2Classes

public static java.lang.Class<?>[] param2Classes(java.lang.Object... objects)
Returns an array which contains the corresponding classes of the objects passed as parameter.

Parameters:
objects - A collection of objects
Returns:
An array which contains the corresponding classes of the objects passed as parameter.
